Package org.bukkit.event.player

Class PlayerPreLoginEvent

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.event.Event
org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerPreLoginEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerPreLoginEvent extends Event
Stores details for players attempting to log in

    • addConnectionPause

      public ConnectionPause addConnectionPause(Plugin plugin, String connectionPauseName)
      Set a pause for your plugin Connection pauses are for fetching data for a player before they MIGHT be allowed to join
      Parameters:
      plugin - Instance of plugin
      connectionPauseName - Name of connection pause (Ensure no duplicates)
      Returns:
      ConnectionPause Object, used to remove a connection pause
